string-array.name: fellowship
string-array.item: Not all those who wander are lost.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger.
Short cuts make long delays.
The wide world is all about you: you can fence yourselves in, but you cannot forever fence it out.
Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement.
All that is gold does not glitter,\n Not all htose who wander are lost.
He that breaks a thing to find out what it is has left the path of wisdom.
For even the very wise cannot see all ends.
Fly you fools.
Advice is a dangerous gift, even from the wise to the wise, and all courses may run ill.
Don\'t adventures ever have an end? I suppose not. Someone else always has to carry on the story.
Handsome is as handsome does.
\"I will take the Ring\", he said, \"though I do not know the way.\"
For nothing is evil in the beginning.

string-array.name: ttowers
string-array.item: There is some good in this world, and it\'s worth fighting for.
Fair speech may hide a foul heart.
I was talking aloud to myself. A habit of the old: they choose the wisest person present to speak to.
The wise speak only of what they know.
The treacherous are ever distrustful.
A red sun rises. Blood has been spilled this night.
Help means ruin and saving means slaying.
Praise from the praise-worthy is beyond all rewards.
Being a cheerful hobbit, he had not needed hope, as long as despair could be postponed.
I have spoken words of hope. But only of hope. Hope is not victory.
Faithful heart may have a froward tongue.
Dreamlike it was, and yet, no dream, for there was no waking.
Yet dawn is ever the hope of men
Every man has something too dear to trust to another.
I have more need of thought than of sleep.

string-array.name: roking
string-array.item: I am glad you are here with me. Here at the end of all things, Sam.
In this hour, I do not believe that any darkness will endure.
Oft hope is born when all is forlorn.
The world is full enough of hurts and mischances without wars to multiply them.
It is useless to meet revenge with revenge; it will heal nothing.
And then her heart changed, or at least she understood it; and the winter passed, and the sun shone upon her.
His grief he will not forget; but it will not darken his heart, it will teach him wisdom.
The whole thing is quite hopeless, so it\'s no good worrying about tomorrow. It probably won\'t come.
\"Come Mr. Frodo!\', he cried. \'I can\'t carry it for you, but I can carry you.\"
End? No, the journey doesn\'t end here. Death is just another path. One that we all ust take.
